personal.name: Shambhavi Singh
personal.title: LLM & Python Engineer
personal.tagline: LLM Fine-Tuning ‚Ä¢ Model Evaluation ‚Ä¢ Python & Data Analysis
personal.bio: I am an LLM & Python Engineer with hands-on experience in Supervised Fine-Tuning (SFT), RLHF-based model evaluation, and high-quality dataset preparation. I specialize in prompt engineering, analyzing model outputs, improving reasoning quality, and building data-driven ML applications. My background includes machine learning projects in healthcare, text analysis, and predictive analytics, supported by strong skills in Python, Pandas, Scikit-learn, and React.js.

experience.title: LLM Python Engineer
experience.description: Worked on improving the performance, reliability, and alignment of large language models (LLMs) through systematic evaluation, prompt refinement, and dataset preparation. Contributed to supervised fine-tuning (SFT) and reinforcement learning from human feedback (RLHF) workflows by analyzing model outputs, identifying weaknesses, and implementing feedback loops. Conducted Python-based unit testing to ensure robust integration across training components. Prepared structured training datasets for a GitHub Discussions based chatbot, rewriting questions, generating answer claims with supporting documentation, and maintaining quality standards across a multi-annotator pipeline.
achievements: Performed systematic evaluation of LLM outputs to assess accuracy, reasoning structure, and reliability
Designed and refined prompts to improve model relevance and response clarity
Conducted unit testing of Python workflow components during model evaluation
Prepared high-quality training datasets for GitHub Discussions chatbot fine-tuning
Reviewed and annotated repository-specific Q&A for clarity, correctness, and instructional value
Rewrote user queries and generated structured answer claims with supporting documentation
Collaborated in a multi-reviewer RLHF / SFT pipeline ensuring consensus-driven improvements

experience.title: Python Development Intern
experience.description: Completed a one-month internship focused on Python-based GUI and multimedia application development. Developed a music player application featuring MP3 browsing, selection, and playback. Implemented event-driven programming logic, intuitive user controls, and file handling using Tkinter for the UI layer and Pygame for audio operations.
achievements: Developed GUI-based music player with functional play/stop controls
Enhanced skills in event-driven programming and multimedia handling
Implemented clean user interface using Tkinter widgets
Demonstrated practical understanding of Python application architecture

experience.title: Machine Learning with Python Intern
experience.description: Completed two-month internship and training in machine learning with Python. Built a wine quality prediction system using data preprocessing, feature correlation analysis, and regression-based modeling. Worked with real-world dataset insights and evaluation metrics to determine the impact of chemical properties on wine quality.
achievements: Developed predictive ML model to analyze and estimate wine quality
Performed dataset cleaning, transformation, and correlation visualization
Implemented regression model evaluation for accuracy and reliability
Demonstrated end-to-end ML workflow from data analysis to model testing

projects.title: EasyMed - Online Healthcare Portal
projects.shortDescription: Machine learning-based disease prediction system for proactive healthcare.
projects.description: Developed a healthcare portal that uses machine learning algorithms to predict diseases in advance. The system includes three major modules: Symptoms-Based Disease Prediction, Diabetes Prediction, and Heart Disease Prediction. Implemented data preprocessing, model training, and evaluation using Pandas and Scikit-learn. Designed a user-friendly Python interface to allow users to input medical parameters and receive prediction results. This project demonstrates the practical use of machine learning for early disease detection and healthcare decision support.
features: Diabetes and heart disease risk analysis
Machine learning model training and evaluation
User-friendly Python UI for input and results

projects.title: URL Text Analyzer
projects.shortDescription: Automated text extraction and sentiment analysis from web pages.
projects.description: Developed a text analysis system that extracts article content directly from URLs. Implemented HTML parsing with BeautifulSoup, text cleaning and tokenization using NLTK, and sentiment scoring for understanding tone. Results are stored in a structured Excel file along with readability scores, word metrics, and sentiment polarity. This project demonstrates skills in data extraction, natural language processing, and automated reporting.

projects.title: Wine Quality Prediction System
projects.shortDescription: Machine learning model to predict wine quality from chemical properties.
projects.description: Built a predictive model to classify wine quality based on acidity, pH, alcohol content, and other measurable characteristics. Performed dataset loading, preprocessing, visualization, and feature correlation analysis. Trained and evaluated ML models using Scikit-learn, with RandomForestClassifier providing optimal performance. This project highlights the use of machine learning for improving product evaluation and quality control.

projects.title: Music Player
projects.shortDescription: GUI-based MP3 music player built using Python.
projects.description: Developed a music player application with an intuitive user interface using Tkinter and Pygame. Users can browse, load, play, and stop MP3 files with ease. Demonstrated event-driven programming, file handling, audio playback control, and UI layout management. Highlights proficiency in building desktop applications and understanding GUI frameworks.

projects.title: Attendance System
projects.shortDescription: Web-based attendance tracker built with React.js.
projects.description: Built a web application that allows students to mark attendance through a clean and responsive UI. Implemented dynamic attendance state updates using React components and Bootstrap for layout styling. Demonstrated component-based UI architecture, state management, and modular code organization. Version control and commits maintained via GitHub.

projects.title: Vehicle Transport Converter
projects.shortDescription: Travel time and fuel consumption calculator.
projects.description: Created a web application to calculate travel time and fuel usage for different vehicles based on user input distance. Implemented dropdown vehicle selection, dynamic calculations, and result display with vehicle image rendering. Demonstrates JavaScript logic implementation and clean UI design.

education.degree: B. Tech - Computer Science and Engineering
education.institution: SRM Institute of Science and Technology, Delhi NCR Campus
education.description: Focused on data structures, algorithms, machine learning, LLM evaluation workflows, web development, and software engineering fundamentals.
Studied Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics with emphasis on analytical reasoning and problem-solving.
Completed foundational academic education with strong performance and active school participation.
